name: ZipBoss
description:
Complete world class platform built to handle any website project, from a simple blog to a full scale ERP with staffing.
ZipBoss offers a wide range of professional services to fulfill all of your web design, e-commerce and other marketing needs. We work with clients in all areas of web and non-web related marketing, growing brands through technology. Our expertise in website development and e-commerce is only matched by our ability to design logos, create interactive presentations and provide your company with other marketing and design services.
Put your business on our platform and leverage world class applications, themes and service. Build the right internet presence from a single website to a full scale enterprise system. Get the true customization you need to show your identity and do it all on one platform, ZipBoss.
READ MORE...
